document_data.name: Clan Ticklebeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Ticklebeard''' was a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] clan, famous for the ''Crazy Wilbur'' technique of fighting.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Clan Ticklebeard had developed the ''Crazy Wilbur.'' The technique involved the [[returning]] dwarvish weapon [[enchantment]]. These enchanted weapons, like ''[[returning pike]]s'', were allowed or forced to be swallowed by their opponents. Then, the fighters called the returning weapons back, making the flight back as ready and messy as possible.
